dimensions.description: Covers all mandatory sub-goals and regulatory/business steps.
Dependencies are correct, acyclic, not redundant.
ACTION nodes are concrete; required inputs are expressible as requirements.
Node naming and goal statements are unambiguous.
No obvious factual mistakes; consistent with evidence.
Fully responds to the node objective; no important omissions.
Explicitly references evidence sources and paths.
Output is directly usable (submit/use) without rework.
